body:
You can tell how many commenters here put women on a pedestal.  The guy straight up tells her that he sees her as a guy (not wanting to embarrass himself that he likes her), and she ends up being really sad then gets showered by attention by another guy

...and she's shallow?  Maybe you guys should stop fantasizing about "unconditional love".
Alpha seed beta need (or in this instance alpha fuck beta cuck...) I hate ntr.

Actually from the looks of things, girl and black haired boy weren’t in a relationship, but he gets sent a picture of her which leads to her confessing, she rejects, not exactly a shallow love on her part
Girl to slut speed run any %
Some love the girl has, so shallow. Easily getting wooed by a random senpai lol

Basically both liked each other but were playin relationship chicken sorta. Anyway girl gets tempted by senpai dude and mc finds out which gives him courage to confess. She says nah cuz she already moved on, the end.
Why is it always the guy that has to confess needs more ntr where the guy gets stolen they're both bitches
leocalonge100: They aren't dating, both wants to but neither has the balls to confess to the other.
